*div1 type="summary"* *p*Mary W. Ellis to Austin, September 3, 1827, Message to her husband.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="09-03-1827">Sept 3 1827, */date_mentioned**location_mentioned*Franklin County, Ala*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin-*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear sir I am the *person_mentioned*wife of Judge Ellis from *location_mentioned*Alabama */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*he went to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*to Collect a debt due from *person_mentioned*Col pettus*/person_mentioned* which debt he was security for and *person_mentioned*pettus */person_mentioned*ran away from here and left him to pay and I wish you to state to *person_mentioned*Judge Ellis*/person_mentioned* if he dont Come home directly he will have his property sold for *person_mentioned*pettus */person_mentioned*the ballance due is usery that part I suppose *person_mentioned*pettus */person_mentioned*will not pay *person_mentioned*Col Pettus*/person_mentioned* has treated *person_mentioned*Judge Ellis */person_mentioned*veary ill and bad about it I have not herd from my *person_mentioned*husband*/person_mentioned* since the*date_mentioned n="05-30-1827"> 30 of may */date_mentioned*for god sake let me know what has become of him since that time and whare he is if he is thare let his see this letter for god sake write me and let me know and if he is dead take care of his property untill I can send for it this from apoore woman that [is] in the cleepist destress pray write amediately and direct your letter to *location_mentioned*Tuscumby franklin County Alabama*/location_mentioned* and I will take it as agreat favor*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mary W Ellis*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:] 25 Paid The*person_mentioned* P. M. at *location_mentioned*Nachitoches */location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*will please forward this by the first safe hand. *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned**location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned* Via *location_mentioned*Nachitoches State of Louisiania*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
